support.title: Feedback & Support

inviteFamily.question: How do I invite family members?
inviteFamily.answer: Go to Dashboard and tap "Create Texter" for children or "Invite Super" for adults. Texters get a Zemi number and password, Supers receive an invitation link via email.

howSos.question: How does the SOS alert work?
howSos.answer: Texters can tap the SOS button to send an emergency alert to their Team Owner with their location. The alert appears immediately on the Dashboard.

whyVisible.question: Why can my Team Owner see my messages?
whyVisible.answer: Zemichat is designed to give parents visibility into their children's communication. Team Owner can see all messages from Texters, including deleted ones. However, Supers' private chats (without Texters) are protected.

upgradePro.question: What's included in the Plus Ringa plan?
upgradePro.answer: Plus Ringa gives you more team members, voice and video calls, document sharing, location sharing, and more. Go to Dashboard and tap "Upgrade" to see all plans.

deleteAccount.question: How do I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer: Go to Settings and scroll down to "Delete account". Team Owners delete the entire team. Supers can delete their own profile. Texters need to ask their Team Owner.
